comments.content:
Hey Josef. It's the finest of DINs...   
Albert-Jan Pool's FF DIN Condensed Bold   
 [http://www.fontfont.de/packages/dinco11201/dinbol33320/dinbol33320\_xx.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909055154/http:/www.fontfont.de/packages/dinco11201/dinbol33320/dinbol33320_xx.html)
